description: It was possible to download all receipts without authentication. Must first access the API https://XXXX.supersmart.me/services/v4/customer/signin to get a TOKEN. Then you can then access the API that provides invoice images based on the URL https://XXXX.supersmart.me/services/v4/invoiceImg?orderId=XXXXX
